Text: cheers mate, did you fix the audio on this one, yesterday was funny too,like i said the 07 was perfect.seems there is more audience volume and back ground volume than the speech audio level??

I'm not sure what the problem could be, marty. All the files have worked fine for me so far. I do have one suggestion. I don't know if it will work, but it's something you can try:

1. Load the file in Media Player Classic
2. Click the "Play" Menu
3. Choose ffdshow Audio Decoder > Properties...
4. Choose "Mixer" (in left column)
5. For "output speakers configuration", choose "1/0/0 - mono"
6. Make sure that "Mixer" is the only option checked in the left column - leave all others UNchecked
7. Click "Apply"
8. Click "Ok"

Again, I don't know if that will fix your problem, but it's all I can think of. Best of luck.
Conan fans watch my clips of the show on YouTube, just search for karnyx.
